review.review_reply: Thank you for your review Sushma! 💕

review.comment: Was sceptical at first but the whole process is seamless and very simple. Right from collecting the fabric, to design consultation, and delivery, the experience was hassle-free and I received my order within 2 weeks of placing. The fit was perfect. Very impressed with this start-up business. I highly recommend this place to anyone in need of a good tailor. I'm glad I took a shot at Binks, worth every penny.
review.review_reply: We’re so glad Nidhya! Thank you so much for sharing your experience. 💕
Thank you for your review Kruthika! 💕

review.comment: I am really happy with the service of Binks... They truly understand one's requirements and do accordingly. Really had a great experience. Found a permanent solution for my wardrobe.
review.review_reply: Thank you Chandrasmita! Your review has made our day 💞

review.comment: Loved the stitching!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Mitali! Hope you choose Binks again 💗

review.comment:
Really easy to order..user friendly interface.. loved the design and people are really polite to talk to😇
I got 4 kurtas stichting done from binks
They schedule the pick-up right away and then design consultant helps to get the perfect design for the fabric..i was so impressed with her suggestions.
Got my kurtas within 8-10 working days.
Also the WhatsApp chat helped a lot to keep the track of my order.
Very happy with the fitting and design
Happy costumer 😊😇
review.review_reply: Thank you Aayushi! We're so glad to hear that you had a good experience. 💖

review.comment: A very seamless process to order and receive the tailored pieces, and everyone that we spoke to from Binks was warm and happy to accommodate whatever requests we had. Even last minute requests were taken, and really fast response times on WhatsApp.  The quality of the stitching is very good and the pieces are sturdy, beautiful and tailored to my taste. Will definitely order again!
review.review_reply: Thank you Ananya, we enjoyed working on your outfit. We will be looking forward to work on your future outfit.

review.comment: Hassle free tailoring experience.. perfect fit and comfort..better than most offline tailoring experience ❤️
review.review_reply: Yay! Thanks for the review, Rashmi ☺️

review.comment:
Incredibly disappointed with my order. After having a detailed discussion with their design consultant sharing specific references.
1. The saree blouses we’re too tight, so much so it was difficult to even take them off.
2. The trouser, was supposed to be a formal trouser but it looked like a pyjama. Had no proper shape, terrible fit, and given that I’m on the heavier side it made me look even fatter.
3. The blouse I asked for that needed to go with the trouser was so tight I couldn’t even close it. Despite me asking for it to be loose.

I was charged over 6k for tailoring 1 trouser, 3 blouses and converting 1 saree into a ready to wear saree. It is such an incredible waste of money. I could just as well have bought something online for the same amount of money and got a better fit.
review.review_reply: Hi Noella, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. Would you mind sharing your order number so we can look into this matter closely? We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment: Was an extremely smooth experience. Dona came and took and measurements. The blouse was delivered before tine and the fitting was perfect. Very happy with the service.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review Anshika! We’re so glad you enjoyed your experience. 💗

review.comment: There were really good initially and did good work. But these guys have bad billing and keep asking money for already paid orders coz they cannot track it properly and fix it. To top it they want 50 rupees to ask what you want and say they cannot do it.. lol 😂 I go to a shop and they say I can’t do it and they want money for that. Simply Ridiculous..who gives you these stupid ideas
review.review_reply: Hello, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. Would you mind sharing your order number so we can look into this matter closely? We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment: Meticulous designing and craftsmanship to suit each needs.. great styling and execution..
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review Lakshmi! It has made our day. 💖

Hi Prachi, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. Would you mind sharing your order number so we can look into this matter closely? We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment: I am so so disappointed with binks. First thing the tops were nothing as per my discussion with the design consultant. It was i who decided the whole outfit, there was no input from her. Even when it came to searching for fabric she gave me like 100s of options. Did not even help in suggesting suitable fabrics so i had to sit and research on fabrics first and then decide on pattern on my own. Then what is the point of the consultant when i decide the outfit, fabrics everything. The worst part is that the delivered items are nothing like it.  I could simply go to a tailor and get it done by myself. It would have been much better i feel. Other than the fit there is nothing right about the tops. I so wish now that i had gone to a known tailor than this. Would have saved a lot of money.
review.review_reply: Hello Tanuja, thank you for sharing your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We will be altering your garment. We're sorry again that your expectations were not matched and hope you would give us another chance to fix it.

review.comment: Nice fiting. Over all good experience
review.review_reply: We're so glad you enjoyed your experience with Binks. Thank you for the review Sujata 💕

review.comment: This was my first experience with the Binks. They got the fabric for me in exact colour I wanted and switched a perfectly fitted blouse😍.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Megha! Your review has made our day 💕

review.comment: I consulted them to see how much they know about clothes. Surprisingly, the consultant couldn't even identify the salwar kameez cloth and its lining which was provided. They are stuck on stitching obsolete designs - blouses, salwar kameez...a local tailor has better sense. They show designs on Insta and try to copy the same. Also, they have not traveled to see what's in vogue. No craftsmanship or intelligence used. Not recommended for Delhi or Mumbai customers. The representative was polite though but didn't have any experience in this field.
review.review_reply: Hello Tamra, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment: The outfits are just the way I had discussed with Binks team! Amazing workmanship! Loved my experience!
review.review_reply: So glad you enjoyed your experience with Binks! 💕 Thank you so much for sharing Dhanashree. We appreciate your support. 😊

review.comment: Excellent stitching.... As per requirement
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your review Sumathi! So glad that you enjoyed your experience with Binks. 💕

review.comment: Extremely happy with service.Dress is well stitched and well fitting.On time  pick up and delivery. Nice design ideas.Kudos to team Binks.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your reply Anju! We appreciate it and hope you continue to choose Binks. 💕

review.comment: I tried Binks for the 1st time and got highly disappointed with their service. Saree fall and pico was okay but blouse (silk saree blouse) stitching was not at all good. The fitting was so bad at 1st, it was difficult for me to wear me, next they informed me that they can’t use concealed zip as they had agreed initially. After 2nd alteration, the fitting of my blouse got worse. I had communicated to them multiple times like I need a good fitting blouse, this is for a wedding still they paid No attention. They charged me ~1500 bucks for a blouse whose fitting is worse
review.review_reply: Hello, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. Would you mind sharing your contact number / order number so we can look into this matter closely? We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment:
This was my second Outfit designed with Binks.
Where I got my saree recycling done to an lehenga ... You guys did an amazing job..Thanks for the customisation.Will soon be back with my next outfit to be designed from you.Thank you Binks 😊
review.review_reply: Thank you Shobhita! We're so glad that you enjoyed your experience Binks and hope you continue to choose us for your tailoring needs! ❤️

review.comment: Very happy with the blouse stitched. I didn’t expect this finishing from online stitching experience. Fitting of the blouse and finishing is good.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much, Kalpana! We are glad you had a great experience and hope you continue to choose Binks. :)

review.comment:
Ordered a jacket, dress and a blouse. They're very slow to respond.
Wanted a silk blouse but they don't have silk mark or any quality assurance, no pricing card with the details.
It took almost month back and forth and finally had to cancel it since they could deliver it only after another half a month. A jacket was also ordered and they informed that they cane take it up after more than a month of reciving the material.
review.review_reply: We're sorry about the experience you had with the jacket and the blouse. We're working on fixing this and we promise to learn from this. Here's hoping we turn your experience around with the dress we're stitching you.

review.comment: Fit is awesome, loved the finishing, communication, delivery - pick up, and professionalism. Thanks
review.review_reply: Thanks for the review Bhavna! :)
Thanks for the rating! ☺️

review.comment: Thoroughly professional, on time pickup and delivery. Can contact them anytime, supportive staff and satisfied with their work. This is my first time experience with them and I've referred my sister's to this place as well.
review.review_reply: Hi Mariam. Thank you so much for taking the time to write us this lovely review. We'd love to know what we could've done better to get a 5-star rating.

review.comment: We have an excellent experience with Binks.
review.review_reply: Woohoo! So glad to hear :)
Thanks so much for the 5-star rating!

review.comment: I had reached out to Binks for a dress and had a great experience. They set up calls with me to discuss the design I was looking for, and recommended materials while considering my budget. They stayed in touch with me constantly regarding the timelines until delivery. Even after delivery, they helped me with a free alteration when I had a slight sizing issue. The icing on the cake: the dress had deep pockets!
review.review_reply: Hi Srinidhi! Thanks for taking the time out to pen this lovely review :)

review.comment: I loved your work so much.. You designed my fabric exactly how I wished to wear.. Keep going❤️
review.review_reply: Oh wow. We're so happy to hear that! Look forward to stitching you something else real soon :)

review.comment: Used Binks for the first time and was very happy with their work and service. I was apprehensive at first but their service made the whole process really smooth. Their stitching was perfect and when there were a few alterations to be made, they were very helpful and accommodating.  Will certainly be using their services again. Thank you,  Binks.
review.review_reply: Thanks for the lovely review :)
Thanks for the rating.

review.comment: I am a new mother and hence for obvious reasons most of my stuff dnt fit me, and I had a wedding to attend and had to get a blouse, honestly I was skeptical and almost considering not wearing a saree. But then I am glad I took this chance. The blouse was done to match my requirement and was delivered on time. It was a Lil tight at my arms, but it had enough and more space to make it lose other than that It was one of best fitting blouses I have received. Going for a few more and can't wait to get the sarees converted into the ready made ones too
review.review_reply: Hi Vrusha! This made our week :) Thanks for the love!

review.comment: This was our first time trying out Binks, and we have are very happy with the results. We were originally concerned because we had to take our own measurements, but the instructional videos helped us out and now we have the set measurements for future use. The design session was easy and quick, and the order was complete and handed over within 10 days of that. The fitting and quality of work is amazing.
review.review_reply: Thanks Shyamli, for your lovely review!

review.comment: Pleasantly surprised by the hassle-free experience of getting an outfit stitched from Binks. Will definitely go back for more - highly recommended!
review.review_reply: Thank you Sonali <3 :) Glad you liked your experience with us!

review.comment: Got a kurta stiched. Worst fit ever, shoulder lengths were uneven, the neck wasn't at the center, alteration wasn't done well, which further spoilt the already spoilt dress. Waste of my material and time
review.review_reply:
Hi Shravya. We're so sorry about the inconvenience caused to you here. To make up for your experience, we've processed a full refund of your order. We're also altering your outfit as we speak.

We hope you give Binks another chance. We promise to turn your experience around.
Thanks for the rating! :)

Hi Sridhar, can you please help us with your order number?
This will allow us to look into the matter. Thank you!

review.comment:
Hi

Today I received my first blouse from Binks along with complementary gift of safety pins and rubber bands ( white, grey and blue).

It's as per my expectations. Perfect fitting and comfortable.

Worth paying.
review.review_reply: Thanks for the review Kanchan <3

review.comment: Very good service. Customer friendly and ontime delivery.  Easy to contact. Had a very good experience . Would definitely recommend to others and continue doing business with them.
review.review_reply: Yay! Thanks so much for your review, Geethanjali.

review.comment: Had such a great experience with Binks and I love the final result, it's better than I imagined! I had a very very specific idea and no exact reference images, but they were able to understand my need and made this spectacular kurta for me!
review.review_reply: Oh wow! Thanks for the lovely review.

review.comment: Worst services . Got stitched blouse , salwar suit and pico for saree. But nothing is as per the measurements given . Have destroyed the saree while doing pico. Threads from saree is coming out . Highly Don’t recommend at all
review.review_reply: Hello, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are so sorry that you feel this way and your expectations were not matched. We would love to make things right if you give us another chance.

review.comment: Really good experience
review.review_reply: Thanks so much! Hope we can stitch you something again soon.

review.comment:
Pathetic & Horrible service. They have zero ethics and don't go by their advertising. They couldn't stitch a simple chudidhar and alter rarely required which is false for free. The alteration is useless and you see no difference. PATHETIC AND CHEATING CUSTOMERS WITH HUGE HOLE ON Pockets. They took to deliver one kurta more than 40 days, imagine the service and no communication till I followed up after 35 days.

Only good service is their pickup & delivery.
review.review_reply: Hi Haritha, our sincere apologies for the experience you'd had. Please allow us time to look into the matter. We'll come back to you on this shortly.
Thanks for the rating, Subhadra :)

review.comment: They did a good job in tailoring the blouse and alterations in lehanga.The fitting is perfect and any alterations claimed is done immediately and returned on time.Will definitely suggest trying this site.Goods delivered on time.
review.review_reply: Hi Prabha! Thanks so much for your review. <3 Hope we can change this rating to a 5-star after your next order. We'll work towards it! ☺️

review.comment: The fit came out perfect and the whole experience was delightful.
review.review_reply: Thanks Sreeja 💙 So glad to hear this!

review.comment: Terrible service. They took 15 days to alter a salwar. I had clearly told them that I needed the blouse for a wedding on April 7 when I placed the order on March 21st. It’s April 11th now . They are neither replying to my messages or returning my money. Very traumatising experience. Never use this service. I would give negative reviews
review.review_reply: Hi Srileka. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused here. Allow us time to look into this and come back to you. You’ll hear from us shortly.
